Aimee Robinson

she/her

Lafayette DPEC At Large Representative

Aimee is a lifelong democrat, who has been active in Lafayette and Louisiana politics for many years. She is currently serving her 2nd term on the state’s DSCC in District 31A, and her 1st term on the Lafayette Parish DPEC as an At large representative. She is a former board member of PFLAG Lafayette, and a member of the League of Women Voters.
